document_data.name: Thessilion Crownsilver
document_data.mainbody: '''Thessilion Crownsilver''' was a member of the [[House Crownsilver|Crownsilver]] noble house of [[Cormyr]]. He was close to [[Pryntaler Obarskyr|King Pryntaler Obarskyr]]. In [[1188 DR]] he was poisoned by a [[gorgon]] while fighting to protect the king.
